name: Don Mueang International Airport
description: Originally known as Bangkok International Airport, it was renamed before Bangkok’s new international aiport, Suvarnabhumi, opened in 2006. The new airport took Don Mueang’s code of BKK and moved to their new code, DMK, which comes from it’s city: *D*on *M*ueang. The *K* likely carried over from the old code.
